casebody.data:
In the Matter of RAVENA-COEYMANS-SELKIRK CENTRAL SCHOOL DISTRICT, Appellant,
v.
TOWN OF BETHLEHEM et al., Respondents, et al., Respondent. 2018-72 Court of Appeals of New York. March 22, 2018

Motion for leave to appeal denied with one hundred dollars costs and necessary reproduction disbursements.
